Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of a fixture.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or brightness or in some cases even opacity shall be controlled with this attribute. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output. If a software makes use of an overall intensity control such as a grandmaster, it is important for the application to understand which attribute to change. In that scenario the dimmer attribute shall be the main intensity, brightness or opacity change.

Attribute.definition: Controls the fixture's sideward movement (horizontal axis).
Attribute.explanation: PAN is one part of the movement that usually controls the horizontal movement. In regards to the fixture the Attribute of PAN will control the overall rotation around the basement of the fixture. If the fixtuer is mounted hanging it usually moves around the Z-axis. But PAN can also be used for virtual control of media server layers or other objects in virtual 3D environments. Usually PAN is used in relation with TILT.

Attribute.definition: Controls the fixture's upward and the downward movement (vertical axis).
Attribute.explanation: TILT is one part of the movement that usually controls the vertical movement .In regards to the fixture the Attribute of TILT will control the overall rotation around the yoke-axis of the fixture. If the fixture is mounted hanging it usually moves around the x-axis or y-axis, depending on the PAN. TILT can also be used for virtual control of media server layers or other objects in virtual 3D environments. Usually TILT is used in releation with PAN.

Attribute.definition: Controls the speed of the fixture's continuous pan movement (horizontal axis).
Controls the speed of the fixture's continuous tilt movement (vertical axis).
Selects the predefined position effects that are built into the fixture.
Controls the speed of the predefined position effects that are built into the fixture.
Snaps or smooth fades with timing in running predefined position effects.
Defines a fixture’s x-coordinate within an XYZ coordinate system.
Defines a fixture’s y-coordinate within an XYZ coordinate system.
Defines a fixture‘s z-coordinate within an XYZ coordinate system.
Defines rotation around X axis.
Defines rotation around Y axis.
Defines rotation around Z axis.
Scaling on X axis.
Scaling on Y axis.
Scaling on Y axis.
Unified scaling on all axis.

The fixture’s gobo wheel (n). This is the main attribute of gobo wheel’s (n) wheel control. Selects gobos in gobo wheel (n). A different channel function sets the angle of the indexed position in the selected gobo or the angular speed of its continuous rotation.
Selects gobos whose rotation is continuous in gobo wheel (n) and controls the angular speed of the gobo’s spin within the same channel function.
Selects gobos which shake in gobo wheel (n) and controls the frequency of the gobo’s shake within the same channel function.
Selects gobos which run effects in gobo wheel (n).
Controls angle of indexed rotation of gobo wheel (n).
Controls the speed and direction of continuous rotation of gobo wheel (n).
Controls frequency of the shake of gobo wheel (n).
Controls speed of gobo wheel´s (n) random gobo slot selection.
Controls audio-controlled functionality of gobo wheel (n).
Controls angle of indexed rotation of gobos in gobo wheel (n). This is the main attribute of gobo wheel’s (n) wheel slot control.
Controls the speed and direction of continuous rotation of gobos in gobo wheel (n).
Controls frequency of the shake of gobos in gobo wheel (n).

This is the main attribute of the animation wheel's (n) wheel control. Selects slots in the animation wheel. A different channel function sets the angle of the indexed position in the selected slot or the angular speed of its continuous rotation. Is used for animation effects with multiple slots.
Controls audio-controlled functionality of animation wheel (n).
Selects predefined effects in animation wheel (n).
Controls frequency of animation wheel (n) random slot selection.
Selects slots which run effects in animation wheel (n).
Selects slots which shake in animation wheel and controls the frequency of the slots shake within the same channel function.
Selects slots whose rotation is continuous in animation wheel and controls the angular speed of the slot spin within the same channel function
Controls angle of indexed rotation of slots in animation wheel. This is the main attribute of animation wheel (n) wheel slot control.
Controls the speed and direction of continuous rotation of slots in animation wheel (n).
Controls frequency of the shake of slots in animation wheel (n).

This is the main attribute of the animation system insertion control. Controls the insertion of the fixture's animation system in the light output. Is used for animation effects where a disk is inserted into the light output.
Sets frequency of animation system (n) insertion ramp.
Sets frequency of animation system (n) insertion shake.
Controls audio-controlled functionality of animation system (n) insertion.
Controls frequency of animation system (n) random insertion.
This is the main attribute of the animation system spinning control. Controls angle of indexed rotation of animation system (n) disk.
Controls the speed and direction of continuous rotation of animation system (n) disk.
Controls frequency of the shake of animation system (n) disk.
Controls random speed of animation system (n) disk.
Controls audio-controlled functionality of animation system (n) disk.
Selects predefined effects in animation system (n).
Selects folder that contains media content.
Selects file with media content.
Selects folder that contains 3D model content. For example 3D meshes for mapping.
Selects file with 3D model content.
Defines starting point of media content playback.
Defines end point of media content playback.
Adjusts playback speed of media content.
Selects predefined color effects built into the fixture.
The fixture’s color wheel (n). Selects colors in color wheel (n). This is the main attribute of color wheel’s (n) wheel control.
Controls angle of indexed rotation of color wheel (n)
Controls the speed and direction of continuous rotation of color wheel (n).
Controls frequency of color wheel´s (n) random color slot selection.
Controls audio-controlled functionality of color wheel (n).
Controls the intensity of the fixture's red emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive Red color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's green emitters for direct additive color mixing
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive Green color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's blue emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive Blue color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's cyan emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive Cyan color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's magenta emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive Magenta color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's yellow emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive Yellow color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's amber emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive Amber color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's lime emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive Lime color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's blue-green emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive Blue-Green color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's light-blue emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive Light Blue color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's purple emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive Purple (Deep Blue) color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's pink emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive Pink color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's white emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive White color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's warm white emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive Warm White color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's cool white emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive Cool White color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the intensity of the fixture's UV emitters for direct additive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of intensity or saturation of an additive UV color/emitter with direct access to the color. Physical values go from 0 = no output, to 1 = full output/saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the insertion of the fixture's red filter flag for direct subtractive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of insertion or saturation of a subtractive Red color flag/filter with direct access to the color. The color is the resulting color when the filter is fully inserted. Physical values go from 0 = no insertion/no color, to 1 = full insertion/full color saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the insertion of the fixture's green filter flag for direct subtractive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of insertion or saturation of a subtractive Green color flag/filter with direct access to the color. The color is the resulting color when the filter is fully inserted. Physical values go from 0 = no insertion/no color, to 1 = full insertion/full color saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the insertion of the fixture's blue filter flag for direct subtractive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of insertion or saturation of a subtractive Blue color flag/filter with direct access to the color. The color is the resulting color when the filter is fully inserted. Physical values go from 0 = no insertion/no color, to 1 = full insertion/full color saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the insertion of the fixture's cyan filter flag for direct subtractive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of insertion or saturation of a subtractive Cyan color flag/filter with direct access to the color. The color is the resulting color when the filter is fully inserted. Physical values go from 0 = no insertion/no color, to 1 = full insertion/full color saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the insertion of the fixture's magenta filter flag for direct subtractive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of insertion or saturation of a subtractive Magenta color flag/filter with direct access to the color. The color is the resulting color when the filter is fully inserted. Physical values go from 0 = no insertion/no color, to 1 = full insertion/full color saturation.

Attribute.definition: Controls the insertion of the fixture's yellow filter flag for direct subtractive color mixing.
Attribute.explanation: Gradual (fading) change of insertion or saturation of a subtractive Yellow color flag/filter with direct access to the color. The color is the resulting color when the filter is fully inserted. Physical values go from 0 = no insertion/no color, to 1 = full insertion/full color saturation.

Attribute.definition: Selects predefined colors that are programmed in the fixture's firmware.
Attribute.explanation: Choose this attribute to control the selection of predefined fixed colors, like Color Presets or Swatchbook Colors. The individual colors are defined by linking wheel slots to channel sets.

Attribute.definition: Controls the time between Color Macro steps.
Controls the fixture's "Correct to orange" wheel or mixing system.
Attribute.explanation: Choose this attribute to control a function that modifies the Color Temperature of a fixture's light output. CTO decreases the Color Temperature from its default. Physical values describe the resulting Color Temperature.

Attribute.definition: Controls the fixture's "Correct to color" wheel or mixing system.
Attribute.explanation: Choose this attribute to control a function that modifies the Color Temperature of a fixture's light output. CTC either increases or decreases the Color Temperature from its default. Physical values describe the resulting Color Temperature.

Attribute.definition: Controls the fixture's "Correct to blue" wheel or mixing system.
Attribute.explanation: Choose this attribute to control a function that modifies the Color Temperature of a fixture's light output. CTB increases the Color Temperature from its default. Physical values describe the resulting Color Temperature.

Attribute.definition: Controls the fixture's "Correct green to magenta" wheel or mixing system.
Attribute.explanation: Choose this attribute to control a function that adjusts the Green/Magenta shift of a fixture's light output.

Attribute.definition: Controls the fixture's color attribute regarding the hue.
Controls the fixture's color attribute regarding the saturation.
Controls the fixture's color attribute regarding the brightness.

Strobe mode shutter. Use this attribute together with StrobeFrequency to define the type of the shutter / strobe.
Strobe mode strobe. Use this attribute together with StrobeFrequency to define the type of the shutter / strobe.
Strobe mode pulse. Use this attribute together with StrobeFrequency to define the type of the shutter / strobe.

Strobe mode random strobe. Use this attribute together with StrobeFrequency to define the type of the shutter / strobe.

Strobe mode random closing pulse. Use this attribute together with StrobeFrequency to define the type of the shutter / strobe.
Strobe mode random shutter effect feature. Use this attribute together with StrobeFrequency to define the type of the shutter / strobe.
Controls the fixture´s mechanical or electronical shutter feature.
Attribute.explanation: Open/close style of change of intensity or brightness. Physical values go between 0 = closed, to 1 = open.

Attribute.definition: Controls the frequency of the fixture´s mechanical or electronical strobe shutter feature.
Controls the frequency of the fixture´s mechanical or electronical pulse shutter feature.
Controls the frequency of the fixture´s mechanical or electronical closing pulse shutter feature. The pulse is described by a ramp function.
Controls the frequency of the fixture´s mechanical or electronical opening pulse shutter feature. The pulse is described by a ramp function.
Controls the frequency of the fixture´s mechanical or electronical random strobe shutter feature.
Controls the frequency of the fixture´s mechanical or electronical random pulse shutter feature.
Controls the frequency of the fixture´s mechanical or electronical random closing pulse shutter feature. The pulse is described by a ramp function.
Controls the frequency of the fixture´s mechanical or electronical random opening pulse shutter feature. The pulse is described by a ramp function.
Controls the frequency of the fixture´s mechanical or electronical shutter effect feature.
Controls the diameter of the fixture's beam.
Sets frequency of the iris's strobe feature.
Sets frequency of the iris's random movement.
Sets frequency of iris's closing pulse.
Sets frequency of iris's opening pulse.
Sets frequency of iris's random closing pulse.
Sets frequency of iris's random opening pulse.
The ability to soften the fixture's spot light with a frosted lens.
Sets frequency of frost's opening pulse
Sets frequency of frost's closing pulse.
Sets frequency of frost's ramp.

The fixture’s prism wheel (n). Selects prisms in prism wheel (n). A different channel function sets the angle of the indexed position in the selected prism or the angular speed of its continuous rotation. This is the main attribute of prism wheel’s (n) wheel control.
Selects prisms whose rotation is continuous in prism wheel (n) and controls the angular speed of the prism’s spin within the same channel function.
Macro functions of prism wheel (n).
Controls angle of indexed rotation of prisms in prism wheel (n). This is the main attribute of prism wheel’s 1 wheel slot control.
Controls the speed and direction of continuous rotation of prisms in prism wheel (n).

Frequency of running effects.
Snapping or smooth look of running effects.
Controls parameter (m) of effect (n)
Controls angle of indexed rotation of slot/effect in effect wheel/macro (n). This is the main attribute of effect wheel/macro (n) slot/effect control.
Controls speed and direction of slot/effect in effect wheel (n).
Sets offset between running effects and effects 2.
Activates fixture's beam shaper.
Predefined presets for fixture's beam shaper positions.
Indexing of fixture's beam shaper.
Continuous rotation of fixture's beam shaper.
Controls the spread of the fixture's beam/spot.
Attribute.explanation: This attribute is used to adjust the beam angle of the light source.

Attribute.definition: Selects spot mode of zoom.
Selects beam mode of zoom.
Controls the image size within the defined projection. Used on digital projection based devices
Controls the sharpness of the fixture's spot light. Can blur or sharpen the edge of the spot.

Autofocuses functionality using distance.

Selects different dimmer curves of the fixture.

Controls behavior of LED pixels.
Selects fixture's pan mode. Selects between a limited pan range (e.g. -270 to 270) or a continuous pan range.
Selects fixture's pan mode. Selects between a limited tilt range (e.g. -130 to 130) or a continuous tilt range.
Selects fixture's pan/tilt mode. Selects between a limited pan/tilt range or a continuous pan/tilt range.
Selects the fixture's position mode.
Changes control between selecting, indexing, and rotating the gobos of gobo wheel (n).
Defines whether the gobo wheel takes the shortest distance between two positions.
Changes control between selecting, indexing, and rotating the slots of animation wheel (n).
Defines whether the animation wheel takes the shortest distance between two positions.
Changes control between selecting, continuous selection, half selection, random selection, color spinning, etc. in colors of color wheel (n).
Defines whether the color wheel takes the shortest distance between two colors.
Controls how Cyan is used within the fixture's cyan CMY-mixing feature.
Controls how Cyan is used within the fixture's magenta CMY-mixing.
Controls how Cyan is used within the fixture's yellow CMY-mixing feature.
Changes control between selecting continuous selection, half selection, random selection, color spinning, etc. in color mixing.
Selects chromatic behavior of the device.
Sets calibration mode (for example on/off).
Controls consistent behavior of color.
Controls special color related functions.
Controls color model (CMY/RGB/HSV...).

Controls behavior of color uniformity.
Controls CRI settings of output.
Custom color related functions (save, recall..).
Settings for UV stability color behavior.
Controls if White LED is proportionally added to RGB.
Changes strobe style - strobe, pulse, random strobe, etc. - of the shutter attribute.
Changes modes of the fixture´s zoom.
Changes modes of the fixture’s focus - manual or auto- focus.
Changes modes of the fixture’s iris - linear, strobe, pulse.
Selects follow spot control mode.
Changes mode to control either index or rotation of the beam effects.
